entities.name: celestina
entities.description: Celestina is the one who ended her song on a very long, high-pitched note. She is described as singing and receiving loud applause from Mrs Weasley.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is the one who asked if it's over after Celestina finished her song. She is described as being enthusiastic and joining in with loud applause.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is the one who suggested having a nightcap after Celestina finished her song. He is described as leaping to his feet and asking if anyone wants egg-nog.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who asked Lupin what he's been up to lately. He is described as having a conversation with Lupin and others in the room.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is the one who has been living among werewolves. He is described as being a spy for Dumbledore and trying to keep his activities secret from Harry.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the one who wanted a spy and chose Lupin for the job. He is not physically present in the scene but mentioned by Lupin.

relationships.description: Mr Weasley asked Harry if anyone wants egg-nog.
Lupin is a spy for Dumbledore, as mentioned by Lupin in the conversation with Harry.
